title: Sepp Kuss Faces First Mountain Test: Who Will Emerge as the Vuelta GC Favorites?
content:
Kuss and the other GC stars ready to test the climbing legs in first summit finale in Vuelta: 'We are not stressed about tomorrow, but we will take it very seriously.'

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss Faces First Mountain Test: Who Will Emerge as the Vuelta GC Favorites? on Velo.
author: ahood
